Issue.creator: mathiasb303
Issue.summary: As a token infrastructure (peer) developer, I want to implement a TMS verifier than validates import transactions
Issue.description: *Acceptance:* An import transaction is passed to the Validate function of the TMS verifier, and the verifier returns success for well-formed import transactions, since there is nothing to check at validation time for import transactions for plain TMS. If the transaction is malformed, or is not an import transaction, an error is returned.
